tool_description: Gives list of colleges, their cutoff with basic information (Location)
name: Cutoff Merit Fetcher
title: Cutoff Merit Fetcher

api_list.name: Get all college list with a specific rank
api_list.description: entered rank will be matched with cutoff rank in database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cutoff-merit-fetcher1.p.rapidapi.com/getcollege/350"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cutoff-merit-fetcher1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cutoff-merit-fetcher1.p.rapidapi.com/getcollege/{rank}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cutoff-merit-fetcher1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all college list

api_list.name: Get college list with VAC seat
api_list.description:
list colleges with vacant seat, /VAC
rank == VAC
api_list.code:
